message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $150?

Thanks for the offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $175. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll find it's still a fantastic deal!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $175 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $160?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $170. It's my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it!
I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $160 and $170. Would you consider selling it to me for $165?
I understand that $165 is a bit above my minimum, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $167. It's my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it!
